name: Home Cooked
description:
Welcome to Home Cooked!

You play as Steve, a chef who is working in the most popular restaurant in town. After work, he goes home to cook for his son. But you only have 3 minutes before dinner time. How many points can you get?  

 This game was made during the GGJ 2019 under the theme of "What home means to you?" and we are releasing an updated version of that game here on itch.io. This is the first 3D game we ever made and we plan on releasing a new game in a couple of months. This game is free but if you liked the game consider donating or send us a follow on our social bird page. Thank you for playing!
